Usage imbued into a melee weapon ikon that deals slashing damage

Your weapon is so sharp even an insect alighting upon its still blade would be severed. Your weapon ikon gains the following ability.

Transcendenceâ€”Sever Four Dragonfly Wings 3 (transcendence) Make a Strike that deals slashing damage with your weapon ikon. If that Strike is successful, you can immediately make an additional Strike against a different target within your reach. You can continue making Strikes in this manner, each against a different target, until you have made a total of four Strikes or you miss with a Strike, whichever comes first. Each attack counts toward your multiple attack penalty, but you do not increase your penalty until you have made all your attacks.
